text: Uniharule aphna chalaharu (anga) sita bhannechanh ki timile hamro virodhama gavahi kina diyau! Ta tiniharule javapha dinechan ki ‘‘juna allahale pratyeka kurala'i vakyasakti pradana gareko cha usaile hamila'i pani bolne sakti pradana gareko cha.’’ Ra usaile timila'i pahilopataka srsti gareko thiyo ra usaitarpha timila'i pharkijanu parnecha
